articles.author: Darryl Fears, Emily Guskin
articles.title: Climate impacts have failed to shift Americans' views on global warming, new Washington Post-ABC News poll finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: Recent climate disasters have failed to shift Americans' views on global warming, a new Washington Post-ABC News poll finds, and the partisan divide has widened.
articles.content: The poll, released Friday, also finds that the partisan divide over the issue has widened. The percentage of Democrats who see climate change as an existential threat rose by 11 points to 95 percent … [+6155 chars]

articles.title: Brazil becomes first South American team to qualify for 2022 World Cup - The Star Online
articles.description: SAO PAULO (Reuters) -     Brazil beat Colombia 1-0 in a World Cup qualifier in Sao Paulo on Thursday to become the first South American team to qualify for Qatar 2022.

articles.title: Defense rests its case at murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The defense rested its case Thursday at the murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse, setting the stage for closing arguments Monday in the shootings that left Americans divided over whether he was a patriot taking a stand against lawlessness or a vigilante.
